title: Sony’s WH-1000XM5 noise-canceling headphones have leaked — here’s what we know
content:
Sony’s WH-1000XM4 is one of the best noise-canceling headphones money can buy. So were its predecessors going back to the company’s OG premium noise-canceling headphone, the MDR-1000X. In other words, Sony has a pretty great streak going on. So I was excited to see leaks of the new WH-1000XM5 begin to pop up. Leaked images of the new headphones posted by The Walkman Blog show a design that departs significantly from Sony’s usual aesthetic. Behold: Credit: The Walkman Blog Someone on Reddit also posted an image of what appears to be a retail unit, seemingly confirming the design and a…

This story continues at The Next Web

Or just read more coverage about: Sony
